name: LD48 (Cladcake)
description:
Have you ever thought about what you would do if you were a rock monster that got lost on the surface? Dig your way back down to your family of course!

Use the ASD keys to dig sideways and downwards, rock monsters obviously can't jump.

Eating rocks isn't easy so it takes energy, watch your energy bar in the top left corner. Eating gold ore replenishes some energy.

Should you find some delicious rubies to eat you can use Spacebar to trigger an explosion.

You can also eat some heavy iron ore, but I'll let you figure out what that does on your own!
